# grdredpol

Compute the Continuous Reduction To the Pole, AKA differential RTP.


::: {.callout-warning}
This GMT supplements module has not yet been ported to the long verbose syntax.
To use it, you will need to use the {{< gmtref monolithic type=general text="Monolithic" >}} mode.
:::

Please open a [Feature Request](https://github.com/GenericMappingTools/GMT.jl/issues) if you would like
to see this module ported to the long verbose syntax, or better yet, consider contributing the port yourself!
